subject: Last CFP - Poland , Sept. 22-24, 2014
from: "The Third International Conference on Informatics Engineering and Information Science (ICIEIS2014)" <donotreply@dcmrf.net>
body:
+-----------------------------------------------------------+ | Please accept our apology for multiple posting. THANK YOU | +-----------------------------------------------------------+ Dear Colleague: Please consider submitting your research paper to the following conferences: The Third International Conference on Informatics Engineering and Information Science (ICIEIS2014) The International Conference on Education Technologies and Computers (ICETC2014- IEEE- Poland Section Both will be in Lodz University of Technology, Lodz, Poland September 22-24, 2014. Please see the details at www.sdiwc.net ---------------------------------------- If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b +-----------------------------------------------------------+
| Please accept our apology for multiple posting. THANK YOU |
+-----------------------------------------------------------+
Dear Colleague:

Please consider submitting your research paper to the following conferences:

The Third International Conference on Informatics Engineering and Information Science (ICIEIS2014)

The International Conference on Education Technologies and Computers (ICETC2014- IEEE- Poland Section

Both will be in Lodz University of Technology, Lodz, Poland

September 22-24, 2014.

Please see the details at www.sdiwc.net



If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b
